meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 切断しない、切り離さない
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) not to cut off, not to separate

examples.translation: 木を切らないでください。
examples.english_translation: Do not cut down the tree.

etymology.value: ラテン語の in- (否定) + decidere (切断する)

verb_forms.present_tense: indecido, indecidis, indecidit, indecidimus, indeciditis, indecidunt
verb_forms.imperfect_tense: indecidebam, indecidebas, indecidebat, indecidebamus, indecidebatis, indecidebant
verb_forms.future_tense: indecidam, indecides, decidebit, indecidemus, indecidetis, decidebunt
verb_forms.perfect_tense: indecidi, indecidisti, indecidit, indecidimus, indecidistis, indeciderunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_tense: indecideram, indecideras, indeciderat, indecideramus, indecideratis, indeciderant
verb_forms.future_perfect_tense: indecidero, indecideris, indeciderit, indeciderimus, indecideritis, indeciderint

usage_notes.explanation: ラテン語の動詞で、現代英語では直接的な対応語は少ない。文脈によっては "not to cut off", "not to separate", "to preserve" などと訳される。
